case.title: I am 5 2"..230 lbs. curvy/busty SMART and you are BIG BOLD BULKY - 50 (Flatiron)
case.text: nothing like the truth, right out there!!! I am not a magazine cover girl but neither are you... I want my match, a man who is single, non-smoker, big bold and husky....makes me feel like a queen. For once in my life I would like to be spoiled with love. I am insatiable, I have a career and I a missing YOU. No younger men.
